title: High Ping
body: I have been playing League of legends for quite a long time and after the server move to chicago i had about 40 ms constantly. but recently my ping has changed to 80 ms which is about the same as it was before the server move and im not quite sure what it is and if something changed, any way i can check if its my end or yours?

replies.body:
This issue is likely caused by inconsistent ISP routing to the server, so we'll want to take a look at your route to the server. We can do this by running a traceroute with [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) to the IP address 104.160.131.1

Simply run the trace for 5 minutes to that address, then export the results as text and paste them in a reply here. Let me know if you have any questions.

|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|

|                                      WinMTR statistics                                   |

|                       Host              -   %  | Sent | Recv | Best | Avrg | Wrst | Last |

|------------------------------------------------|------|------|------|------|------|------|

|                             192.168.1.1 -    0 |  564 |  564 |    0 |    0 |    2 |    0 |

|                             10.133.24.1 -    0 |  564 |  564 |    5 |    8 |   18 |    6 |

|acr07mdsnwi-tge-0-3-0-0.mdsn.wi.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |    5 |    8 |   16 |    7 |

|acr01mdtnwi-tge-0-0-0-1.mdtn.wi.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |    5 |    9 |   18 |    8 |

|   dtr02ftbgwi-bue-5.ftbg.wi.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |    6 |    9 |   19 |   13 |

| crr01ftbgwi-bue-101.ftbg.wi.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |    5 |    8 |   20 |    8 |

| crr01euclwi-bue-400.eucl.wi.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |   11 |   14 |   24 |   17 |

|crr02sgnwmi-tge-0-0-0-4.sgnw.mi.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |   12 |   16 |   32 |   13 |

|   bbr02euclwi-bue-5.eucl.wi.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |   12 |   16 |   27 |   17 |

|   bbr01chcgil-bue-1.chcg.il.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |   34 |   41 |   55 |   42 |

|   prr01chcgil-bue-2.chcg.il.charter.com -    0 |  564 |  564 |   34 |   38 |   51 |   39 |

|                           104.160.131.1 -    0 |  564 |  564 |   34 |   38 |   51 |   37 |

|________________________________________________|______|______|______|______|______|______|

Not the OP, but I have been having similar issues. My ping was around constant 26 ms after the server move, and now it's been around 50 ping for about the last month. Above is my results. Feel free to give solutions. Thanks!

It seems your connection hikes up from 27ms to 55ms on the following node: * bbr01chcgil-bue-1.chcg.il.charter.com*

Since this happens on charter's network, you'll want to get in touch with a tier 2 tech on their support team and provide them with this traceroute so they can investigate. Let me know if you have any further questions.
